casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Edward J. O'BRIEN, III, Petitioner Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Edward J. O'Brien, III, Petitioner No. 63 MAL 2018
No. 64 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 22, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 22nd day of May, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

Petitioner's Application to Set Aside Bail Revocation is DENIED.
